log_level.name: Log Level
log_level.description: Minimum log level (trace, debug, information, warning, error, or critical; default=information)

mqtt_host.name: MQTT Host
mqtt_host.description: Host of the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically.

mqtt_port.name: MQTT port
mqtt_port.description: Port of the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically. (default=1883)

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Optional username for the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically.

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Optional password for the MQTT broker. If you use the mosquitto addon, this will be discovered automatically.

mqtt_client_id.name: MQTT Client ID
mqtt_client_id.description: Optional client ID for the connection. If not specified, a random one will be generated by the client. The ClientID must be unique across all broker connections.

mqtt_use_tls.name: MQTT Use TLS
mqtt_use_tls.description: Whether or not to use TLS for the MQTT connection. (default=false)

mqtt_allow_untrusted_certificates.name: MQTT allow untrusted certificates
mqtt_allow_untrusted_certificates.description: If Use TLS is true, this will bypass certificate validation and allow untrusted certificates. (default=false)

mqtt_ignore_certificate_chain_errors.name: MQTT Ignore certificate chain errors
mqtt_ignore_certificate_chain_errors.description: If Use TLS is true, this will ignore certificate chain errors. (default=false)

mqtt_ignore_certificate_revocation_error.name: MQTT Ignore certificate revocation errors
mqtt_ignore_certificate_revocation_error.description: If Use TLS is true, this will ignore certificate revocation errors. (default=false)
